educations.responsebility: Under direct supervision, processes routine orders for material/merchandise or handles part of a more complex order processing system. May follow orders from placement to delivery, using a non-complex manual or computerized order processing system. Maintains records of orders, prices, inventory, and related data under well-defined procedures. Typically requires a high school education or equivalent and less than two years of related experience.

Assigned client cases, Executive Customer Communications, Escalated Customer Complaints and Legal customer issues in a professional and timely manner. When case volume mandates, provide support to the CR department by handling client cases. In addition be the designated back up for Client Cars.
